query: SELECT id, externalId, message, senderType, source, createdAt FROM chat_messages WHERE studentId = (SELECT id FROM students WHERE phone LIKE '%15997612063%' LIMIT 1) AND createdAt > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 20
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3TwTEpp3aQwpk4j.26ab54900c35 --database SFH8sqABSCK5KntMvXXcPM --execute SELECT id, externalId, message, senderType, source, createdAt FROM chat_messages WHERE studentId = (SELECT id FROM students WHERE phone LIKE '%15997612063%' LIMIT 1) AND createdAt > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 20
